original_text: Among the other nations, Israel has been successful. It has been like a plant that grows well. But now the Lord will send trouble. It will be like a strong east wind that comes from the desert. Israel's wells and springs of water will become dry. All the valuable things that Israel has stored will disappear. Among the other nations, Israel has been successful. It has been like a plant that grows well. But now the Lord will send trouble. It will be like a strong east wind that comes from the desert. Israel's wells and springs of water will become dry. All the valuable things that Israel has stored will disappear. Among the other nations, Israel has been successful. It has been like a plant that grows well. But now the Lord will send trouble. It will be like a strong east wind that comes from the desert. Israel's wells and springs of water will become dry. All the valuable things that Israel has stored will disappear. Among the other nations, Israel has been successful. It has been like a plant that grows well. But now the Lord will send trouble. It will be like a strong east wind that comes from the desert. Israel's wells and springs of water will become dry. All the valuable things that Israel has stored will disappear. Among the other nations, Israel has been successful. It has been like a plant that grows well. But now the Lord will send trouble. It will be like a strong east wind that comes from the desert. Israel's wells and springs of water will become dry. All the valuable things that Israel has stored will disappear. Among the other nations, Israel has been successful.
korean_text: 그가 비록 형제 중에서 결실하나 동풍이 오리니 곧 광야에서 일어나는 여호와의 바람이라 그의 근원이 마르며 그의 샘이 마르고 그 쌓아 둔 바 모든 보배의 그릇이 약탈되리로다

sentences.original_text: Among the other nations, Israel has been successful.
It has been like a plant that grows well.
But now the Lord will send trouble.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이제 주님은 재앙을 보내실 것이다.

sentences.original_text: It will be like a strong east wind that comes from the desert.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 사막에서 불어오는 강한 동풍 같을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Israel's wells and springs of water will become dry.
All the valuable things that Israel has stored will disappear.
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘이 저장한 모든 귀중한 것들은 사라질 것이다.
